alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 7:07PM CDT until August 03 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Wayne County in south central Illinois... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 707 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Omega, or 9 miles east of Salem, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Cisne around 740 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Johnsonville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
